[[Category:Scripting Commands Armed Assault|MODELTOWORLD]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts position from object model space to world space in render time scope. For ASL version see [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object '''modelToWorldVisual''' modelPos </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modelPos: [[Array]] - in format [[PositionRelative]] ([x,y,z] offset relative to the model centre) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - world position in format [[PositionAGL]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_aboveAndBehindPlayer = [[player]] [[modelToWorldVisual]] [0,-1,3];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[modelToWorld]], [[vectorModelToWorldVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]], [[worldToModelVisual]], [[worldToModel]], [[selectionPosition]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
